protocol.name: P-GSE47884-1
protocol.text: Expression analysis and normalisation was performed in R using the RMA package following a previously established pipeline (D'Onofrio et al. Funct Plant Biol 2009). ID_REF =  VALUE = RMA-normalized signal intensity

protocol.name: P-GSE47884-2
protocol.text: Embryos were extracted fom seeds using syringe tips in an eyeglass containing 1xPBS, above an ice-filled petri dish. Samples were left on ice for less than 1 hr before snap freezing in liquid nitrogen.

protocol.name: P-GSE47884-3
protocol.text: Wild type plants were grown under standard laboratory conditions according to Laux et al. 1996, Development.

protocol.name: P-GSE47884-4
protocol.text: Total RNA was extracted using the Plant RNeasy Kit (Qiagen) according to manufacturer's instructions.

protocol.name: P-GSE47884-5
text: Samples were labelled according to the Small Sample Labelling Protocol according to ATLAS Biolabs (Berlin, Germany) and Affymetrix instructions (

protocol.name: P-GSE47884-6
protocol.text: A standard Affymetrix hybridisation protocol was used at ATLAS Biolabs, Berlin, Germany.

protocol.name: P-GSE47884-7
protocol.text: A Hewlett-Packard scanner was used at ATLAS Biolabs, Berlin, Germany.
